jSimPack

Class RandomSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • jSimPack.RandomSource

  • public class RandomSource
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class for Random that lets us manage the random seed. Random cannot tell you what random seed was used after it is created, and you cannot reseed it later. This provides both features.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Random r 
      protected long seed 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomSource()
      Create a random source using the current unix time as a seed.

    • Method Summary

      Reset the random object with the specified seed
